title: Nexus Siege
body: Please put any other mode or just not any mode at all this week because it is lagging the hell out of me playing, 200 ping. Nexus siege is the most boring mode that they can put AND THE FCKEN PUT IT FOR 2 WEEKS IN A ROW. Any other mode PLEASE, doesn't have to be urf but urf is the best in my opinion, but please just remove and add any other mode. It is also lagging the sht out of me when I play and it happened today when it was in queue.  JUST PLEASE REMOVE THIS! {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Riot worked too hard on it to admit it is horribly imbalanced and unfun.
What the person above me said is 1000% accurate.
